description: Bush allamanda is an incredibly beautiful and easy to cultivate plant. The large, glossy, dark green leaves are a delightful contrast to its fragrant yellow flowers which bloom from summer to autumn. Growing in tight clumps, it provides a refreshing and vibrant presence in the garden. It's a great pick for gardeners looking for a trouble-free and low maintenance plant, as it only needs occasional pruning and minimal watering. Not to mention, its blooms are a great addition to any floral arrangement. With its easy upkeep, stunning flowers and bright foliage, bush allamanda is an amazing addition to any garden.
